messages.content:
URGENT: Search for "tents under 100" on Google Shopping as FAST as possible.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Take ONE screenshot
2. If search box visible: clear it, type "tents under 100", press Enter
3. If not on Google Shopping: go to shopping.google.com, then search
4. Wait 2 seconds for results
5. STOP - do not scroll or click anything else

BE FAST. NO EXTRA ACTIONS. NO SCROLLING. NO CLICKING PRODUCTS.
I'll help you search for "tents under 100" on Google Shopping as quickly as possible. Let me start by taking a screenshot to see the current state of the screen.
I can see the Firefox browser is open with multiple tabs. I need to navigate to Google Shopping. I'll click on the address bar and type the Google Shopping URL.
Good, the address bar is active and showing search suggestions. I need to clear it and type the Google Shopping URL. I'll select all and then type the new URL.
Now I'll type the Google Shopping URL:
Perfect! I can see the suggestion dropdown with the Google Shopping URL. I'll press Enter to navigate to it:
I can see the page is loading (notice the URL shows http://shopping.google.com). Let me wait a moment for the page to fully load:
Perfect! Google Shopping has loaded. I can see the search box at the top of the page with placeholder text "Shop for anything". I'll click on it to clear it and type "tents under 100":

message.content: Good, the search box is now active (I can see the cursor in the search box). Now I'll clear any existing text and type "tents under 100":
